statements: SELECT * FROM researcher_data LIMIT 5;
SELECT researcher_id, sensor_id, timestamp FROM researcher_data WHERE sensor_id = 'af033a2f-395b-4a63-a2f1-024c603d0704';
SELECT researcher_id, sensor_data FROM researcher_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM researcher_data WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-15T12:00:00Z' AND timestamp < '2022-01-16T12:00:00Z';
SELECT sensor_id, COUNT(*) AS data_count FROM researcher_data GROUP BY sensor_id ORDER BY data_count DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM researcher_data WHERE researcher_id = 'c8e46de0-4080-4d38-ad2e-7f58b4c5e7e5';
SELECT researcher_id, sensor_id, timestamp FROM researcher_data WHERE sensor_id = '3c3acf7c-7521-4c18-8ea3-a515e34c7846';
SELECT sensor_id, COUNT(sensor_id) AS sensor_count FROM researcher_data GROUP BY sensor_id ORDER BY sensor_count DESC;
SELECT researcher_id, sensor_data->>'temperature' AS temperature_reading FROM researcher_data WHERE sensor_id = '0d4d2f13-b697-48a7-bf0d-7dcfc6c5a3b1';
SELECT DISTINCT sensor_id FROM researcher_data ORDER BY sensor_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM researchers WHERE researcher_id = 1;
SELECT researcher_name, research_area FROM researchers WHERE research_area = 'Biology';
SELECT researcher_id, researcher_name FROM researchers ORDER BY researcher_name DESC;
SELECT AVG(data_value) FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 2;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, timestamp FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT researcher_name, research_area FROM researchers WHERE researcher_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM researchers ORDER BY researcher_name DESC;
SELECT AVG(data_value) AS average_value, sensor_type FROM sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_type;
SELECT researcher_name, research_area, sensor_type, data_value FROM researchers JOIN sensor_data ON researchers.researcher_id = sensor_data.sensor_id;
SELECT researcher_name, sensor_type, timestamp FROM researchers JOIN sensor_data ON researchers.researcher_id = sensor_data.sensor_id WHERE data_value > 50;
SELECT * FROM Researchers;
SELECT researcher_name, researcher_id FROM Researchers ORDER BY researcher_name ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_model, sensor_location FROM Sensors WHERE sensor_location = 'Laboratory';
SELECT * FROM SensorData WHERE data_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY data_timestamp DESC;
SELECT AVG(data_value), sensor_id FROM SensorData GROUP BY sensor_id;
SELECT * FROM Researchers WHERE researcher_id = 1;
SELECT researcher_name FROM Researchers WHERE researcher_id > 3 ORDER BY researcher_name DESC;
SELECT sensor_model, sensor_location FROM Sensors WHERE sensor_location = 'Lab A' ORDER BY sensor_model;
SELECT sensor_id, MAX(data_value) AS max_value FROM SensorData GROUP BY sensor_id;
SELECT data_id, sensor_id, data_value, data_timestamp FROM SensorData WHERE data_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM researchers;
SELECT researcher_name, research_area FROM researchers;
SELECT * FROM sensors WHERE location = 'Lab A';
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type FROM sensors ORDER BY sensor_type ASC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM research_projects WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM researchers ORDER BY researcher_id DESC;
SELECT sensor_type, location FROM sensors WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM research_projects WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT researcher_name, research_area FROM researchers WHERE research_area LIKE '%Science%';
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp, temperature FROM sensor_data WHERE humidity > 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM researchers;
SELECT id, name, email FROM researchers ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date FROM research_projects WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, location FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type LIKE '%temperature%';
SELECT data_id, sensor_id, timestamp, value FROM sensor_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM researchers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM researchers WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM research_projects WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp, value FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_type, location FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' AND location LIKE '%Lab%';
